lines.speaker: Villain
text: Well, well, well. You've learned a new trick. Just like the old days, isn't it?
Training and training and training, all so you could "protect her".
You failed, of course. It almost makes me wonder whether that was your real reason...

lines.speaker: Hero
text: Don't you DARE say that. Don't you DARE say I didn't care about her.

lines.speaker: Villain
text: HA-HA-HA!!! Struck a nerve, have I?
Aren't you just a LITTLE concerned thinking about it?
About how maybe, if you had TRULY loved her, you would have been able to save her?
